statements: SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_packaging_materials;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_materials WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA';
SELECT material_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_packaging_materials WHERE supplier_name = 'GreenTech';
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_materials ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC, material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, country_of_origin FROM sustainable_packaging_materials WHERE country_of_origin IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_materials WHERE supplier_name = 'EcoPack Inc' OR supplier_name = 'GreenWorld Supplies';
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_materials WHERE supplier_name = 'EcoPack Inc' AND sustainability_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_materials;
SELECT source_type, source_location FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT material_name, source_type, source_location FROM sustainable_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT material_name, source_name, contact_person FROM sustainable_materials JOIN material_sources ON sustainable_materials.id = material_sources.material_id;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, source_type, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT source_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM material_sources ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials WHERE sustainability_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT material_name, source_location FROM sustainable_materials WHERE source_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, source_country FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT material_name, amount_purchased, purchase_date FROM packaging_materials JOIN sourcing_records ON packaging_materials.material_id = sourcing_records.material_id;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, source_country FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%paper%';
SELECT supplier_name, amount_purchased, purchase_date FROM suppliers JOIN sourcing_records ON suppliers.supplier_id = sourcing_records.supplier_id WHERE amount_purchased > 1000;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, source_location FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT order_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT material_name, source_location, sustainability_rating FROM packaging_materials WHERE sustainability_rating >= 5 ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM suppliers INNER JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, location;
SELECT material_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM packaging_inventory WHERE quantity < 100 AND expiration_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_location FROM packaging_sources WHERE source_location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM packaging_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY inventory_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_sources WHERE source_location LIKE '%City%';

SELECT p.material_name, s.supplier_name, o.quantity FROM packaging_materials p INNER JOIN packaging_orders o ON p.material_id = o.material_id INNER JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id ORDER BY o.quantity DESC;
